Reviews.Title: I was shipped a FI8918W with no I/O ports
Reviews.Author: MidnightRunner
Reviews.Content: I wanted the older model with the I/O ports on the back as shown in the pics, however they sent me a FI8918W which is newer, but I would prefer the model as shown.  I have also read that the Fi9818W did not have a mounting hole that was threaded the same as a camera, however on mine it is the same and I can mount this on a tripod if I wish.  The camera works OK, video quality is not spectacular, but if you are familiar with inexpensive security cams this should be no surprise.  The 2 way audio which was supposed to be improved over the older model is hit and miss, which really makes it pointless.  Additionally for firefox the vlc (videolan) plugin needs to be installed to get sound (IE can get it with a plugin from the manufacturer).  The pan and tilt functions do work well, though I have not found a way to set it up to patrol regularly.I can verify that this works with IPCamViewer on an android device, only bug with that app was that the L/R buttons were reversed (not a ding against Foscam however).Overall a cool toy, but the lack of I/O ports and the sound quality (or lack thereof) bring it down a couple stars.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera at a bargain price
Reviews.Author: K. Dobson
Reviews.Content: I use this for our vacation house to serve several functions. When idle it is aimed at the front door including a view of the big screen TV. In the event of intrusion, it is set to email me multiple pictures giving me a better sense of security when we are away for weeks at a time. Also it comes in handy for a quick weather check. Mounted in a window frame, I can pan to the deck to see how much snow to expect on the way up in the winter. Only complaint is it creeps out the kids when they borrow the house. Whenever cabin in use I just aim it at the ceiling and shut it off. Overall very satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good for the price, not so great outdoor images
Reviews.Author: Mark Druziak
Reviews.Content: First of all, you do not get the webcam shown in the photos. You get the Foscam FI8918.  It looks pretty similar but it doesn't have the alarm ports on the back.Set up was easy enough.  I didn't install the software that comes with this cam.  I simply plugged the cam into my router, found the IP address on my network and used a browser (Google Chrome) to log in.  There is a lot of setup you need to do on your router if you are going to view this webcam from outside your house.  You will need to set up a static IP for the cam and then setup port forwarding.  You also should use a DNS service if your internet provider changes your modem's IP address from time to time (most do).Image quality of indoor images is good even in the dark.  Outdoor images are very washed out and the colors aren't that good.  I have since learned that if you want good outdoor images, you need to buy a web cam with an IR cut filter.  This cam does not have an IR cut filter.  I have this cam sitting in a window.  You can't use the night time illumination (IR LEDs) to light anything outside because the LEDs just reflect off the window.  Indoor image quality is good when lit by the IR LEDs.If the outdoor image quality were better, this would be a 5 star cam.  If all the stuff about the router set up sounds difficult to you, that is really the nature of any IP based web cam and there are some good tips and a forum on the Foscam site that should help

Reviews.Title: Works Good!
Reviews.Author: Tech Gadget
Reviews.Content: I'm impressed!  The IP cam worked better than what I expected, good range of movement, nice night vision and sound and audio that works well with IE7.  Our first experiment for the Foscam was a petcam setup ...we always wondered what the dog did while we were away.  I can even turn-on the speaker and call to our little critter... got him all confused lol!  Easy to setup, I didn't even open the manual nor use the install disk... just followed hints from other reviews.  First, plugged the cam into the router and opened router configuration to find the cam's IP address.  Next, I logged onto the cam, configured user accounts and WiFi settings, disconnected the lan cable and presto... wireless cam found the router!  Then, I setup the cam with a free account on "no-ip.com" to view our petcam on the internet.  After allowing internet propagation of our new host setup on no-ip.com and port-forwarding, we now have petcam anywhere... fantastic!  Highly recommended and a great buy!Update7/22/2012; after 6 months of 24/7 use, the camera has an issue, locks-up about monthly and needs a power cycle reboot... somethings several to get the router to see the cam again... Which means reset the cam before leaving on vacation so the it stay up and running for as long as you are gone. I have two foscam but this cam seemed more problem pronged than the fixed foscam. Also, sound, mic and video record requires activeX to work... Meaning Windows only! Not a big issues. I like the alarm setting where the cam will email you clear pictures when it detects movement... Great for posting around the streets... "Do you know this guy???".  So, stlll works but with issues.

Reviews.Title: it works!
Reviews.Author: leahc117
Reviews.Content: I just bought the foscam FI8918W to use as a baby monitor.  I am not the greatest with computers so I watched the videos on foscams website and then called the technical support department.  Sandra from technical support actually took over my computer remotely and went through the setup with me.  Great service!  Now that the camera is working I can see my babies room from my iPhone!  The sound works great, image is great and I can turn and tilt the camera right from my phone.  It is so cool.

Reviews.Title: I'm an IT person. I think this camera is a great deal.
Reviews.Author: Pipthenapster
Reviews.Content: So some of the reviews for this camera are pretty negative, but in all honesty, they have to either be from folks who don't know very much about wireless networks, or they're trying to position the camera ungodly far from their router. Even though this camera is an "indoor" model, I have it outdoors hanging from the underside of my eaves, pretty damn far away from my router, and it's working perfectly. I also utilized DDNS to port the camera's webpage to an external address, and it has worked beautifully. There's even a friggin' free Android app to watch your camera feed if you port the DDNS out. All this for like $50 or $60? That's a great deal. To anybody who gives this a negative view, please tell me what better deal you found. The Foscam even has built in motion detection. It'll email you a burst of photos any time there's motion.

Reviews.Title: Works flawlessly!
Reviews.Author: Mark Frank
Reviews.Content: We bought and used this to monitor our house and pets when we were on vacation in Europe for 3 weeks.  I'm an IT guy and the wireless configuration and IP forwarding weren't too challenging for me, but I could see where it might be difficult to configure for some non-technical folks.  The good news is that the documentation, especially on the FOSCAM web site, was very helpful.  We accessed the web cam via the FoscamPro iPhone/iPad app, and the new version is superb!  We had no problem viewing the camera in real-time from across the Atlantic Ocean.  Picture quality was very good, and I was also very impressed with the IR (night vision) feature.  Great camera at a great price!  Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: See's Everything and Worth It
Reviews.Author: okinawahall
Reviews.Content: This is a good Camera.  Its the right price for what it does.  Pitch dark at night and I still see.  Have it outside under the porch roof recording all that happens in front of my home.  Great as you can hear what is being said to.  This is worth the money and will do what it says it will.  FYI its a FOSCAM and other sites have this camera with FOSCAM removed but the same for less.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Francis Burrows "Frank"
Reviews.Content: i bought this to monitor a panel on my boat and it has exceeded my expectations. As others have pointed out the setup is definitely not plug and play. Unless you configure routers for a living setting this thing up so you can look at it from anywhere is going to take you some time. But reading the instructions over and over again and getting on Google, it can be done. It is worth the time and the second one you do will be real easy.

Reviews.Title: AMAZING !!!
Reviews.Author: Paul I Nichols Jr
Reviews.Content: Product works better than I expected, with a wide range of movement, excellent adjustments for contrast and brightness and the most amazing night vision ability to see in the dark.  The only thing I would do next time is buy one that has a zoom and auto focus, which I am sure is a lot more money, but if you want to perhaps read a thermometer or something like that, those capabilities might be useful.Overall, it is freaking unbelievable and I may get one for outside too.  My daughter immediately bought one as soon as she saw how cool it is to spy on the cat when you are at work.

Reviews.Title: It is not the model advertised.
Reviews.Author: Fernando D.
Reviews.Content: The model received is the FI8918W, it cost $59.99 here in amazon.  I bought this one because of the i/o ports for an alarm, and it doesnt have them.  Dont believe what you see in the picture and don't pay $74.99 for this one, it is a scam, look for it by model FI8918W.

Reviews.Title: Wrong color, but works well anyways!
Reviews.Author: Lord Harthington
Reviews.Content: The color was wrong. I received black, but I'm not worried about the aesthetics much anyways. This is not a simple "plug and play" camera. It is, however, very easy to learn how to install and use. You just have to know how to enter an IP address in a browser, configure the camera to connect to your wireless network, and that's about it! It works well with the Android app I use with it (there's plenty on the Play store, and Amazon App Store), and the Infrared LEDs, PTZ, and Two-Way audio all work quite well.

Reviews.Title: Delivers what is promised
Reviews.Author: Gopster
Reviews.Content: This camera delivers on all its promises, but remember, it is meant for security, so the picture quality is that of a security camera. You are not going to capture any Kodak moments on this one. But for the price, you can't complain.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic!
Reviews.Author: Lisa B.
Reviews.Content: Never dreamed we would feel that we would ever need security cameras, but this camera is great.  It works beautifully!

Reviews.Title: I can't complain... much.
Reviews.Author: Dave the Pear
Reviews.Content: For a sub $100 camera, I really cannot complain at all. I've spent much more for similar cameras with fewer features. I did not install the software that came with it. I hooked it to the LAN, plugged it in, looked in the router for the IP that DHCP gave it, went to that IP in my browser, admin is the user, no password. You can also hit the WPS button on your router and hold the reset button on the bottom of the camera for 4 seconds (no longer) to set up wireless. You'll still have to find the IP that DHCP gave it.The firmware in the camera was actually HIGHER than the firmware updates offered on their site! huh?!The night vision is actually very good, I'm slightly impressed! I love the ability to turn the IR off and on via web interface or my cell using IP Cam Viewer (Robert Chou). Dark colors are grainy and full of noise, average ambient light has washed out colors, and good light equals good picture. It records video by itself, without audio, providing it has a place to save it. It records audio and video if you have it open in Internet Exploiter with the audio turned on.The microphone is pretty sensitive, and while I'm glad there is actually a built-in speaker it's barely audible most of the time, but it's got input and output on the back of the camera for external audio equipment.The pan and tilt were VERY slow at first, because in settings 0 = Very Fast and 15 = barely noticeable movement. The start up of the camera goes through a rather lengthy "calibration" of the pan and tilt, but it accurately returns to position #1 after a power cycle.The interface in anything but IP Cam Viewer and Internet Exploiter is rather lacking, audio is possible in Firefox according to the brief link: "If you want to add audio,you can download plugin from [...] but I didn't find the plugin they were referring to, I didn't look very hard either. Upon changing any settings that require a reboot, you will see "The device is rebooting. Don't shutdown it's power. Please wait ..." - Don't shut down it IS power!!! same as Loftek...overall, it's a good camera, for the price...

Reviews.Title: Does a great job
Reviews.Author: Discount Supply Co.
Reviews.Content: We've used this little camera in several locations and it has worked like a champ!  I would definitely recommend it!

Reviews.Title: FOSCAM FI8918W Wireless Internet Remote Access Camera
Reviews.Author: George Espinola
Reviews.Content: I want to start saying that years had passed since I bought a camera with great quality! It arrived on time, very well packed and easy to assamble. For estetic and decoration reasons I chosed the white one and it is really nice. The manual is a little bit complicated when it comes to the point when you want to make the camera goes wireless. I had to call support and and they call me back in less than 12 hours. You may think that from the momment you have to call support it is already a pain but let me tell you this: I got this nice lady name Sandra and she was great! She really understands what your problem is, goes straight to the point and if you want, she can do everything remontly, from updating the firmware to make the camera go life on wireless and the internet. I work with thelecomm and I know how calling support can be a pain but this is not the case of FOSCAM. Personaly what it counts for me is to have a greaat support and for sure I got it from Sandra! Great product, great quality and oustadning support! Thanks FOSCAM! Keep up the great job!!! From now on, only FOSCAM Cameras!!!

Reviews.Title: Wireless doesn't work
Reviews.Author: PMA
Reviews.Content: I use this to monitor my dog while I'm at work.  The wireless doesn't work and it was very hard to install.  There is no help number to call so you're on your own.  When I use the camera (finally had to use an ethernet cord) at work and try to move it it's very slow and sometimes gets overloaded and uncontrollably turns.  The picture is ok...but I guess for the price and if you don't mind having to have it wired it's fine.  Also I wasn't able to set up the motion sensor to email me...

Reviews.Title: Difficult to set up
Reviews.Author: Rod
Reviews.Content: The instructions for this device ask you to follow some website links saying that they are free which is no longer the case. Without this link the device cannot be controlled from outside of your home network. The solution might be to pay $45 for setup but I was not willing to do that since it was not sold as necessary

Reviews.Title: Foscam F18918W
Reviews.Author: Gordon Isherwood
Reviews.Content: I read some of the reviews saying how hard this camera was to install. I messed around for about a month trying to decide if I was willing to spend the time trying to install it. I have to say, it was pretty easy. It does get a little confusing with all of the tech stuff but if you follow the directions provided it installs in a snap. I have even installed viewers on my tablet and phone. I have it sitting inside a window right now so the night vision is not great but with the porch light on I can see my whole front yard. I had it up and running in less than an hour and during the daylight it is great. I have not set up the motion or alarms at this point, not sure I will. But it does not look real complicated. I am looking to mount it outside and if it works well enough I am probably going to buy one for the back yard. Keep in mind this is not a professional level security camera, of course you are paying that kind of price either. It is what it is, a nice camera for the money that will monitor an area. I would recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Foscam wireless camera
Reviews.Author: Gary Powell
Reviews.Content: The product arrived promptly, But the wireless dosnt work with my router. It doesnt work well with windows explorer it will only work with google chrome. although it is cheap dont waste your money.

Reviews.Title: a good cam
Reviews.Author: Ibrahim
Reviews.Content: This camera is very good and i got the newst modelThe setting was very easyThank you a lot

Reviews.Title: Received new model FI8918W not the old model
Reviews.Author: jeffindc
Reviews.Content: I haven't used the product yet, but I ordered in a bit of a hurry and after ordering I noticed that the description and photo of this item matches the older Foscam FI8908W.  After reading this version didn't support WPA2 I realized I would have to return it.Luckily the item I received was the newer FI8918W and for a cheaper price than the other vendors.  I don't know if this is a mistake or just what they are sending out now.  But none the less I am happy that everything worked out.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: READ THIS BEFORE: I had a Westell modem/router in one, ok im super lucky i have Century link as my internet provider. Well first of all i could not hook this cam up at all to my westell so i needed to go out and get just the modem witch was provided by my internet company and i had to by myself a router. Now with all that said and done because some modem change ip addresses i needed to get my own with is call a static ip address lmao. Yea i learned all this in two days. So after a new modem a new router witch i bought myself and i had to buy a static ip address witch was 20 bucks a month though my internet company, i then thank god have 24hr 7day a week teck support though my company. Now remember i know nothing about hooking up anything. Some people say you just hook it up and thats all haha i would love to meet those people. ok all in all i spent 90 for the cam 80 for the router and 20 a month though my internet provider for the static ip address. Well tech support was free for me if you need tech support you are going to be one pissed off person with what companys are charging for that. So there is no way i would have been able to hook this up. So unless you are really good at hooking up things haha or you have some serious knowledge haha your going to hate trying to hook this up. Well with all that said that cam ROCKS . goood luck

ProductInfo.Features:
Simple to setup, Friendly GUI, DIY installation
High image & video quality,Two-way audio monitoring
Allow remote Pan/Tilt control (Pan:270°& Tilt:120°)
Auto IR-LED illumination for night vision (up to 8 metres)
Allow remote viewing & record from anywhere anytime
ProductInfo.Name: Genuine FOSCAM wireless white IP camera Pan 270° Tilt 120° MJPEG Night Vision 2 way audio
